about_the_game:
Software introduction:



NB Desktop is a fully functional desktop wallpaper software.


This DLC
Including functions:

Play audio files, support MP3, WMA and other mainstream audio files

It can display unique playback dynamic pictures.
detailed_description:
Software introduction:



NB Desktop is a fully functional desktop wallpaper software.


This DLC

name: NB Desktop - Music

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Due Q6600 or AMD Althon X4 635
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX760 or ATI R7 260X
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Play audio files, support MP3, WMA and other mainstream audio files It can display unique playback dynamic pictures.
